column4: After installing ubuntu 12.04 desktop, I get an error hd0 cannot get c/h/s values... i've tried running boot repair, tried installing to another partition, no luck.  I am installing from a USB that was created from the iso.
error hd0 cannot get c/h/s values!
when I type set, I see prefix=(hd0,msdos1)/boot/grub
i can boot to my usb stick
.... gparted says /dev/sdb1 is set to boot
did you do a clean install ?
formatted all the drives with gparted
and your "/dev/sdb1" is that the disk with the OS ?
if so then it should be not hd0 but hd1
